1#include <furi_hal_cortex.h>
2#include <furi.h>
3
4#include <stm32wbxx.h>
5
6#define FURI_HAL_CORTEX_INSTRUCTIONS_PER_MICROSECOND (SystemCoreClock / 1000000)
7
8void furi_hal_cortex_init_early() {
9 CoreDebug->DEMCR |= (CoreDebug_DEMCR_TRCENA_Msk | CoreDebug_DEMCR_MON_EN_Msk);
10 DWT->CTRL |= DWT_CTRL_CYCCNTENA_Msk;
11 DWT->CYCCNT = 0U;
12
13 /* Enable instruction prefetch */
14 SET_BIT(FLASH->ACR, FLASH_ACR_PRFTEN);
15}
16
17void furi_hal_cortex_delay_us(uint32_t microseconds) {
18 furi_check(microseconds < (UINT32_MAX / FURI_HAL_CORTEX_INSTRUCTIONS_PER_MICROSECOND));
19
20 uint32_t start = DWT->CYCCNT;
21 uint32_t time_ticks = FURI_HAL_CORTEX_INSTRUCTIONS_PER_MICROSECOND * microseconds;
22
23 while((DWT->CYCCNT - start) < time_ticks) {
24 };
25}
26
27uint32_t furi_hal_cortex_instructions_per_microsecond() {
28 return FURI_HAL_CORTEX_INSTRUCTIONS_PER_MICROSECOND;
29}
30
31FuriHalCortexTimer furi_hal_cortex_timer_get(uint32_t timeout_us) {
32 furi_check(timeout_us < (UINT32_MAX / FURI_HAL_CORTEX_INSTRUCTIONS_PER_MICROSECOND));
33
34 FuriHalCortexTimer cortex_timer = {0};
35 cortex_timer.start = DWT->CYCCNT;
36 cortex_timer.value = FURI_HAL_CORTEX_INSTRUCTIONS_PER_MICROSECOND * timeout_us;
37 return cortex_timer;
38}
39
40bool furi_hal_cortex_timer_is_expired(FuriHalCortexTimer cortex_timer) {
41 return !((DWT->CYCCNT - cortex_timer.start) < cortex_timer.value);
42}
43
44void furi_hal_cortex_timer_wait(FuriHalCortexTimer cortex_timer) {
45 while(!furi_hal_cortex_timer_is_expired(cortex_timer))
46 ;
47}
48
49// Duck ST
50#undef COMP0
51#undef COMP1
52#undef COMP2
53#undef COMP3
54
55void furi_hal_cortex_comp_enable(
56 FuriHalCortexComp comp,
57 FuriHalCortexCompFunction function,
58 uint32_t value,
59 uint32_t mask,
60 FuriHalCortexCompSize size) {
61 uint32_t function_reg = (uint32_t)function | ((uint32_t)size << 10);
62
63 switch(comp) {
64 case FuriHalCortexComp0:
65 (DWT->COMP0) = value;
66 (DWT->MASK0) = mask;
67 (DWT->FUNCTION0) = function_reg;
68 break;
69 case FuriHalCortexComp1:
70 (DWT->COMP1) = value;
71 (DWT->MASK1) = mask;
72 (DWT->FUNCTION1) = function_reg;
73 break;
74 case FuriHalCortexComp2:
75 (DWT->COMP2) = value;
76 (DWT->MASK2) = mask;
77 (DWT->FUNCTION2) = function_reg;
78 break;
79 case FuriHalCortexComp3:
80 (DWT->COMP3) = value;
81 (DWT->MASK3) = mask;
82 (DWT->FUNCTION3) = function_reg;
83 break;
84 default:
85 furi_crash("Invalid parameter");
86 }
87}
88
89void furi_hal_cortex_comp_reset(FuriHalCortexComp comp) {
90 switch(comp) {
91 case FuriHalCortexComp0:
92 (DWT->COMP0) = 0;
93 (DWT->MASK0) = 0;
94 (DWT->FUNCTION0) = 0;
95 break;
96 case FuriHalCortexComp1:
97 (DWT->COMP1) = 0;
98 (DWT->MASK1) = 0;
99 (DWT->FUNCTION1) = 0;
100 break;
101 case FuriHalCortexComp2:
102 (DWT->COMP2) = 0;
103 (DWT->MASK2) = 0;
104 (DWT->FUNCTION2) = 0;
105 break;
106 case FuriHalCortexComp3:
107 (DWT->COMP3) = 0;
108 (DWT->MASK3) = 0;
109 (DWT->FUNCTION3) = 0;
110 break;
111 default:
112 furi_crash("Invalid parameter");
113 }
114}
